column4: ok... i'm in a considerable amount of trouble, heh.. i just downloaded and installed the fglrx package using synaptic.. did nothing, so i restarted to see if it would take effect - now when i go to boot up, i get a screen of very messed up black and white blocks.. flashes four times. recovery mode attempt to fix graphic problems didn't fix this
is anyone able to help me out.  i'm on my laptop currently
you could maybe try a:   sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
